SEARCH
Package core

Class Notification

java.lang.Object
core.Notification
All Implemented Interfaces:
INotification
Direct Known Subclasses:
EmailNotification, SMSNotification
public abstract class Notification extends Object implements INotification
Represents a notification sent to students. This abstract class encapsulates the properties and behaviors of a notification. It follows the Single Responsibility Principle (SRP) by focusing solely on notification-related responsibilities, such as holding notification details and providing a method to send the notification.

      Constructs a new Notification with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      notificationId - the unique identifier for the notification
      studentId - the ID of the student receiving the notification
      message - the content of the notification
      type - the type of notification (e.g., EMAIL or SMS)
